sect1.title: libglvnd-&libglvnd-version;
sect1.sect2:
Introduction to libglvnd
libglvnd is a vendor-neutral dispatch layer for arbitrating OpenGL API calls between multiple vendors. It allows multiple drivers from different vendors to coexist on the same filesystem, and determines which vendor to dispatch each API call to at runtime.

sect2.title: Installation of libglvnd
sect2.para: Install libglvnd by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build
meson setup .. --prefix=/usr
ninja

sect2.title: 32-bit Installation of libglvnd
sect2.para: Install lib32-libglvnd by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build
CC="gcc -m32" CXX="g++ -m32" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib32/pkgconfig \ meson setup .. --prefix=/usr \ --libdir=/usr/lib32
ninja
DESTDIR=$PWD/DESTDIR ninja install cp -vr DESTDIR/usr/lib32/* /usr/lib32 rm -rf DESTDIR ldconfig
